name: INCancelRideIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for canceling a previously booked ride.

items.name: func confirm(cancelRide: INCancelRideIntent, completion: (INCancelRideIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can cancel the ride.

items.name: func handle(cancelRide: INCancelRideIntent, completion: (INCancelRideIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the user canceling an unfinished ride.
